pages.text: The Ancient's Almanac is the result of countless hours of research and experimentation dedicated to unraveling the mysteries of the past. The 'Ancients' are a mythical people that held valuable knowledge within our world; this reading will teach you how to wield it for yourself.

The explanations provided in this book assume that you have at least visited the End, but your journey begins in the far reaches of the dimension.$(br2)Familiarize yourself with navigating the End islands. Find an End City and its Elytra, then mark the location, as you should with every city you encounter.
